set(CINDER_LIB_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cinder/cinder.lib")
set(CINDER_INCLUDE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cinder/include")

add_library(cinder STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)

set_target_properties(cinder PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CINDER_LIB_PATH}"
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CINDER_INCLUDE_PATH}"
)
